title: Bosch B426 Web Configuration Credential Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Bosch B426. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of login credentials provided to the login.cgi endpoint. The issue results from displaying sensitive information in plaintext. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose sensitive information in the context of the user.
addtionnal_details: Bosch has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://psirt.bosch.com/security-advisories/bosch-sa-196933-bt.html
